serviceDetails: Want to freely explore your destination, without thinking about cab numbers or bus timetables?
Just Rent a car with Bumblebee! Enjoy your trip and leave the bureaucracy with us!
We know that is not easy to find a secure transport at the airport.
Bumblebee thought of a way to make you live your experience to the fullest. Just rent the transport from and/or to the airport with us and chill out!
Bumblebee Local Tourist Guide gives you an entirely new experience from the city you are in!
With this service, you will get access to every secret spot, only known by the ones who live in the city!
And more! This service is available 24/7, non stop!
